00034 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00035 /// CTreeTraceView
00036 ///
00037 /// @description  This class allows the user to view the trace of a tree. It is
00038 ///               based on the QTableWidget which it uses for all of the display
00039 ///               and drawing functionality.
00040 ///
00041 /// @limitations  The QTableWidget allows for minimal customization in how the
00042 ///               grid is drawn. Row and Column headers and the fonts can be
00043 ///               changed as well as the cell contents. It cannot change the
00044 ///               thickness or color of individual lines, nor can it display any
00045 ///               not within a cell.
00046 ///
00047 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00048 class CTreeTraceView : public QTableWidget
00049 {
00050     Q_OBJECT
00051 
00052 public:
00053     CTreeTraceView( QWidget *parent );
00054     ~CTreeTraceView();
00055 
00056     QSpinBox *getDepthSelector();
00057     QSpinBox *getQSDepthSelector();
00058     QToolButton * getAIConfigButton();
00059     QLabel *getAILabel();
00060 
00061 
00062     void setGraphModel( CTreeGraphModel *model );
00063 
00064     QList<QStringList> gridFromCall( STreeCall *call );
00065     QList<QStringList> gridFromTrace( STreeTrace *trace );
00066 
00067  void signalRepaint(void) { retrace(); }
00068 
00069 protected slots:
00070     void retrace();
00071     void saveTrace();
00072 
00073 private:
00074     CTreeGraphModel    *m_graphModel;
00075     CTreeTracerSelector *m_selector;
00076 
00077     STreeTrace      *m_trace;
00078     CStyleToolkit   *m_style;
00079 };
00080 
00081 #endif /*_CTREETRACEVIEW_H_*/
